org.hibernate.validator.internal.metadata.descriptor

类 ConstraintDescriptorImpl<T extends Annotation>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hibernate.validator.internal.metadata.descriptor.ConstraintDescriptorImpl<T>
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Serializable, javax.validation.metadata.ConstraintDescriptor<T>

    public class ConstraintDescriptorImpl<T extends Annotation>
extends Object
implements javax.validation.metadata.ConstraintDescriptor<T>, Serializable
    Describes a single constraint (including its composing constraints).
    另请参阅:

      • getAnnotation

        public T getAnnotation()
        从接口复制的说明: javax.validation.metadata.ConstraintDescriptor
        Returns the annotation describing the constraint declaration. If a composing constraint, attribute values are reflecting the overridden attributes of the composing constraint
        指定者:
        getAnnotation 在接口中 javax.validation.metadata.ConstraintDescriptor<T extends Annotation>
        返回:
        the annotation for this constraint

      • getGroups

        public Set<Class<?>> getGroups()
        从接口复制的说明: javax.validation.metadata.ConstraintDescriptor
        The set of groups the constraint is applied on. If the constraint declares no group, a set with only the Default group is returned.
        指定者:
        getGroups 在接口中 javax.validation.metadata.ConstraintDescriptor<T extends Annotation>
        返回:
        the groups the constraint is applied on

        public Set<Class<? extends javax.validation.Payload>> getPayload()
        从接口复制的说明: javax.validation.metadata.ConstraintDescriptor
        The set of payload the constraint hosts.
        指定者:
        getPayload 在接口中 javax.validation.metadata.ConstraintDescriptor<T extends Annotation>
        返回:
        payload classes hosted on the constraint or an empty set if none

        public javax.validation.ConstraintTarget getValidationAppliesTo()
        从接口复制的说明: javax.validation.metadata.ConstraintDescriptor

      • getMatchingConstraintValidatorDescriptors

        public List<ConstraintValidatorDescriptor<T>> getMatchingConstraintValidatorDescriptors()
        Return all constraint validator descriptors (either generic or cross-parameter) which are registered for the constraint of this descriptor.
        返回:
        The constraint validator descriptors applying to type of this constraint.

      • getAttributes

        public Map<String,Object> getAttributes()
        从接口复制的说明: javax.validation.metadata.ConstraintDescriptor
        Returns a map containing the annotation attribute names as keys and the annotation attribute values as value.

        If this constraint is used as part of a composed constraint, attribute values are reflecting the overridden attribute of the composing constraint.

        指定者:
        getAttributes 在接口中 javax.validation.metadata.ConstraintDescriptor<T extends Annotation>
        返回:
        a map containing the annotation attribute names as keys and the annotation attribute values as value

      • getComposingConstraints

        public Set<javax.validation.metadata.ConstraintDescriptor<?>> getComposingConstraints()
        从接口复制的说明: javax.validation.metadata.ConstraintDescriptor
        Return a set of composing ConstraintDescriptors where each descriptor describes a composing constraint. ConstraintDescriptor instances of composing constraints reflect overridden attribute values in ConstraintDescriptor.getAttributes() and ConstraintDescriptor.getAnnotation().
        指定者:
        getComposingConstraints 在接口中 javax.validation.metadata.ConstraintDescriptor<T extends Annotation>
        返回:
        a set of ConstraintDescriptor objects or an empty set in case there are no composing constraints

        public boolean isReportAsSingleViolation()
        指定者:
        isReportAsSingleViolation 在接口中 javax.validation.metadata.ConstraintDescriptor<T extends Annotation>
        返回:
        true if the constraint is annotated with ReportAsSingleViolation

      • unwrap

        public <U> U unwrap(Class<U> type)
        从接口复制的说明: javax.validation.metadata.ConstraintDescriptor
        Returns an instance of the specified type allowing access to provider-specific APIs.

        If the Bean Validation provider implementation does not support the specified class, a ValidationException is thrown.

        指定者:
        unwrap 在接口中 javax.validation.metadata.ConstraintDescriptor<T extends Annotation>
        类型参数:
        U - the type of the object to be returned
        参数:
        type - the class of the object to be returned
        返回:
        an instance of the specified class
